.
Rejection of a Request for an Administrative Review
CO may reject a request for an administrative review that
is inconsistent with the provisions of
M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, 1.A.1.c
or
d
, or
merely affords an additional, intermediate step in the legacy appeal or decision review process.
Reference
:Â  For more information on
when it is appropriate to submit a request for an administrative review, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, 1.A.3.a
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section A  - Compensation Service and Pension and Fiduciary (P&F) Service Guidance
citation: Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section A
